= Database schema =

Username: hgphoto_treasur<br>
Database: hgphoto_treasureHunt<br>
Password: MegaMan1983<br>

drop table if exists users;
CREATE TABLE users (<br>
	uId INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, <br>
	username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,<br>
	password CHAR(32) NOT NULL,<br>
	lastLogin DATE NOT NULL,<br>
	registerDate DATE NOT NULL,<br>
	registered BOOL<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists games;<br>
CREATE TABLE games (<br>
	gId INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,<br>
	gname VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,<br>
	expires DATE NOT NULL,<br>
	created DATE NOT NULL<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists gameCoordinates;<br>
CREATE TABLE gameCoordinates (<br>
	pId INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,<br>
	gId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	lattitude FLOAT NOT NULL,<br>
	longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,<br>
	pointNumber int NOT NULL,<br>
	FOREIGN KEY (gId) REFERENCES games(gId)<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists  gameMembers;<br>
CREATE TABLE gameMembers (<br>
	gId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	uId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	joined DATE,<br>
	FOREIGN KEY (gId) REFERENCES games(gId),<br>
	FOREIGN KEY (uId) REFERENCES users(uId)<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists gameNotes;<br>
CREATE TABLE gameNotes (<br>
	nId INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,<br>
	pId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	note TEXT,<br>
	FOREIGN KEY(pId) REFERENCES gameCoordinates(pId)<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists gameScores;<br>
CREATE TABLE gameScores (<br>
	gId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	score INT DEFAULT '0',<br>
	FOREIGN KEY(gId) REFERENCES games(gId)<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>

drop table if exists userScores;<br>
CREATE TABLE userScores (<br>
	uId INT NOT NULL,<br>
	score INT DEFAULT '0',<br>
	FOREIGN KEY(uId) REFERENCES users(uId)<br>
) TYPE=MyISAM COLLATE=utf8_icelandic_ci;<br>
